title: First Ride: The Cannondale Synapse Gets a Whole Lot More Smart … Sense and Room for Gravel Tires
content:
Remember that clunky SmartSense system? Its back and wrapped around one of the most compelling road bikes of 2025.

Read the full article at First Ride: The Cannondale Synapse Gets a Whole Lot More Smart … Sense and Room for Gravel Tires on Velo.
author: Alvin Holbrook
